com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.network

Class NetworkMessageSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.AbstractMessageSender
      • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.network.AbstractNetworkMessageSender
        • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.network.NetworkMessageSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessageSender

    public class NetworkMessageSender
extends AbstractNetworkMessageSender
implements IMessageSender
    Extends the super class define the format of the byte array sent as a serialization of the IApplicationDescriptor and IMessage objects. Works together with NetworkMessagReceiver.
    Author:
    dawood
